text: Hello everyone, I'm Zehra. I am an Economics-History student at Koç University,and actively share content on sustainability, circular economy, climate crisis and entrepreneurship on my Linkedin channel.  In addition, I am working at Evreka(a social entreprise about waste management) content specialist As a hobby, I run with  Rundamental-a run club- in Istanbul, Turkey and prepare for trail races. It's great to be here! Let's connect via Linkedin <https://www.linkedin.com/in/zehranursimsek/>
